Title: To Soridormi's Aid
Description:
Have you heard? Time rifts are opening in Tyrhold Reservoir! It's a catastrophe! Folks have seen portals to other timeways randomly appearing. Now all kinds of fantastic creatures are swarming into Azeroth.

Thank goodness for Soridormi. I heard she's getting everyone organized to make a stand. If you can offer any assistance, I'm sure she could use it.

They say she's still stationed in Tyrhold Reservoir. Do it for Valdrakken. Do it for Azeroth!
ObjectivesText: Speak with Soridormi in Tyrhold Reservoir.
